[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: ShortMatch {
                keyword: Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 1,
                    position: 7,
                },
                default: None,
                arms: [
                    MatchArm {
                        conditions: [
                            Bool {
                                value: true,
                            },
                        ],
                        arrow: Span {
                            line: 4,
                            column: 10,
                            position: 24,
                        },
                        body: Expression(
                            Literal(
                                String(
                                    LiteralString {
                                        value: ""Hello, world!"",
                                        span: Span {
                                            line: 4,
                                            column: 13,
                                            position: 27,
                                        },
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                ],
            },
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 5,
                    column: 2,
                    position: 44,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
